name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with over 10 years of experience in testing, automating, and reporting for backend systems and APIs. Proficient with **ISTQB** standards, utilizing robust testing strategies to support financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines.
